title: Should We Be Adverse to the Metaverse?
sub_head: Students discuss life in world in which business and personal interactions take place in an ever more realistic virtual reality.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss the metaverse. Next week we’ll ask, “Elon Musk has sold 10% of his Tesla stock, $1.1 billion worth, reportedly over worries about new taxes. What are we to make of these possible new taxes?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Dec. 7. The best responses will be published that night.
